title: High School On Sex Behind The Scenes
overview: The upcoming documentary "High School On Sex Behind The Scenes" promises to take the viewers on a journey to the inner workings of a high school sex education program. The film will feature on-set interviews with the instructors, producers, and students who have participated in the program. One of the main objectives of the documentary is to shed light on the challenges and successes of incorporating sex education into the curriculum of high schools, and to highlight the importance of informative, non-judgmental instruction in this area
